meanings.definition: Suitable for use as a bed.
meanings.sent1: The soft mattress was so beddable that I fell asleep instantly.
meanings.sent2: The new sheets were very beddable and made the bed look cozy.
meanings.sent3: The beddable pillows seemed to call out for a nap.
meanings.sent4: The beddable comforter enveloped me in warmth like a hug.
meanings.sent5: The beddable duvet felt like a cloud against my skin.

meanings.definition: Capable of being placed in a bed.
meanings.sent1: The lightweight frame was beddable and easy to move around.
meanings.sent2: The compact design of the nightstand made it beddable in any room.
meanings.sent3: The beddable lamp added a touch of elegance to the bedside.
meanings.sent4: The beddable throw blanket draped perfectly over the foot of the bed.
meanings.sent5: The beddable bookshelf fit snugly next to the bed.

meanings.definition: Desirable or attractive enough to be invited to bed.
meanings.sent1: Her charming smile made her irresistibly beddable to everyone she met.
meanings.sent2: The alluring scent of the flowers made the garden beddable to bees.
meanings.sent3: The delicious aroma of the freshly baked cookies was beddable to all guests.
meanings.sent4: The stunning view from the balcony was beddable enough to spend the night stargazing.
meanings.sent5: The inviting warmth of the fireplace made the room beddable for a cozy evening.
